mapper.insert:
insert into t_user_gains (user_id, live_room_total_amount, live_room_real_incomes, distributer_total_amount, distributer_real_incomes, user_total_amount, user_total_real_incomes ) values
(#{item.user_id},#{item.live_room_total_amount}, #{item.live_room_real_incomes},#{item.distributer_total_amount},#{item.distributer_real_incomes},#{item.user_total_amount}, #{item.user_total_real_incomes})
